getChainResponders(uint256).details: Get all responders for a chain

notifyResponders(uint256,uint8,uint8,str.details: Notify all responders of an incident (called by IncidentManager)

returns.successCount: Number of responders that successfully responded

registerResponder(uint256,address,uint8).details: Register a responder for a specific chain

params.chainId: The Orbit chain to monitor (0 for all chains)
params.minSeverity: Minimum severity to trigger this responder

responderCount(uint256).details: Total number of responders listening for a chain
